293 US Flight-Cuts Frozen At 6% As More Controllers Show Up For Work (www.zerohedge.com) posted 1 hour ago by TateDemarcus 16 comments award share report block US Flight-Cuts Frozen At 6% As More Controllers Show Up For Work ZeroHedge - On a long enough timeline, the survival rate for everyone drops to zero www.zerohedge.com

They're changing the way they assess loans to include more things. https://www.mpamag.com/us/mortgage-industry/industry-trends/fannie-mae-scraps-minimum-credit-score-for-du-loans/555870 permalink parent award report block reply f_bastiat 4 points 1 hour ago Can someone explain why ATCs are not hired by the airport? I feel like if the airport had control of the towers they wouldn't be so antiquated. Government and inefficiency go hand in hand. Honestly it seems like the entire role could be automated. permalink award report block reply RedStoneDeepState 2 points 53 minutes ago Because a series of crashes under FDR's administration were used to justify nationalization. permalink parent award report block reply BarrysOFace 2 points 1 hour ago Atc is a nationwide system. permalink parent award report block reply Badfinz_FL 1 points 51 minutes ago In some places, usually at smaller airports that operate control towers with no TRACONs, they are private.  They still have to be former FAA certified or Military certified controllers though. permalink parent award report block reply SBOJ_JOBS 1 points 53 minutes ago Large airports are run by governmental agencies just as corrupt as federal agencies. Some medium-to-small airports have privately operated towers but that industry, totally dependent upon the favors of the Fed, is almost as corrupt and DEI as any Federal agency. permalink parent award report block reply SBOJ_JOBS 4 points 1 hour ago Airlines cut their least profitable flights and switch to larger airplanes on key routes.
